article.title: Row-Centric Lossless Compression of Markov Images

multiple_choice_question.text: In Figure 1, which context set utilizes both the row above and below the pixel being encoded?
Figure 2 depicts the parameters used for different model-based coding schemes.  Which parameter consistently decreases as the block size (n) increases?
choices: All parameters decrease at the same rate

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Figure 3, which coding scheme consistently achieves the lowest coding rate for a given block size (n)?
In Figure 4, what is the trend observed in the performance difference between 1-sided model-based and 1-sided empirical-based coding as the context size (c) increases?
